description:
COURSE DESCRIPTION:

Learning this technique, you will not have contracts to be respected and you will be free to manage your life.

This is basic course that teaches every detail TECHNIQUE OF LIFTING and repair dent HAIL, a Knock from parking caused by a ball, from another machine or an accident.

You'll wonder, WHEN I learn? When you have a theoretical understanding of how to do!

At beginning of the course you do not learn to lift and repair dents, but you will practice to be more confident with the dexterity and the glance.

Warning: this teaching is for seeking repair of paintless dent removal Hail flawless, without shadows, you will understand seeing the video, because it goes a dent worked 360 Degrees, the dent is 360 degrees, so it's not good work dent just standing still in one spot and look at it from a perspective but you have to watch it to 360 degrees.

AFFIRM THIS CONCEPT IS NOT A CASE, I try to do to you UNDERSTAND WHAT GO EARLY MEETING.

Do not take this course if you're not tough, because it is easier to repair a 'dent in some way that 100%. Do not do it.

This is a technique ITALIAN AND EUROPEAN, is DIFFERENT from other techniques NOT RIPARARNO The DENT TO 360 DEGREES.

BY THE END OF THIS course you will:

The mastery of knowing how to raise, raise a 'dent.

The conceptual understanding of how to use the technique.

The mastery of how to see where you are with your tool.

Mastery of move with the tool of millimeters.
title: Paintless Dent Repair: art of repair hail & parking dent
